I have been playing this game for about 3 years now across multiple accounts. Through my time playing I have enjoyed this game very much. It is a fun, strategic, and just an overall good game. However, there is a lot of toxicity and cheaters. I have found the best way to get around that is to simply buy prime. It's well worth it because without prime, every game you play will have cheaters. It kinda sucks that they make it like that but if you fully invest yourself into this game you will like it.
This is great game, I love planting the bombs.

Игра нравится своей динамикой, скучно не будет. Первое время привыкаешь и желательно играть на одной карте (набить руку). Минус - попадаются игроки с читами, которые ломают игровой процесс и здоровую конкуренцию.
